entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tool install should implicitly do dotnet tool update #28664
  • When compiling the dotnet/sdk project the ASPNetCore version doesn't match the cloned code #28663
  • `dotnet publish` updates `project.deps.json` for a project with a `PackageReference` with `PrivateAssets="All"` even when nothing has changed #28661

Closed

  • Workloads should be able to control the relative import order of .props and .targets #22358
    7.0.1xx
  • WorkloadManifest.targets should be imported in a pre-determined order for `7.0` #28607
    7.0.0
  • APICompat.Task targets file should be validated in CI #28300
  • PackageValidation enqueues work items for strict mode true and false #25853
  • ApiCompatibility Symbol filtering story is incomplete #16920
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet test does not find any tests if environment variable is set that ends with dll #28592
  • dotnet build fails without any warning or error #28226

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28668
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28666
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix typo in tab-completion.md #28636
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run less tests per Helix Proc to Increase Pipeline Performance #28623
    Infrastructure
  • Return workload manifests in defined, controllable order #28627
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2025250 #28658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix parsing for arguments ending with dll/exe #28662
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28648
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update arcade dependency to pick up new pools and build images #28641
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Implicit RID Opt Out + Don't Infer RID for non EXE Type Projects #28628
    Bug, Servicing-consider
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Adding some loc locked tags #28553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28643
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure workload installers can be read by other users #28608
    Area-Workloads
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
